thread.title: JC
thread.title_full: The 2 Week Diet reviewed by JC

author: JC
title: JC
text:
Fad diets, crash diets, all juice diets; I have seen it all and I have tried it all. Weight loss has been a frustration for me. It is easy for me to gain weight but it is difficult to shed pounds off. In my eagerness to have a sexy body, I have gone to great lengths to lose a few pounds. Sometimes, my choices were not the wisest and I almost ended up in the hospital.
So, now I am wiser when it comes to my diet choices. Before I choose a particular diet, I do my research and make sure that it is safe. Then I came across the 2 Week Diet. Backed by research, it piqued my interest and I decided to try it. The 2 Week Diet handbook puts focus on the primary nutrients the body needs such as protein, fiber and carbohydrates. By taking the right nutrients at the right time, I was able to maximize my weight loss and transform my body.
